rules.title: The Rules
rules.subtitle: Clear expectations lead to great results. Here's how we keep prices low and delivery fast.
rules.rule1Description: Your delivery countdown begins immediately after successful payment. No delays, no waiting for confirmation calls.
rules.rule2Description: Every order includes 2 rounds of minor revisions. Feedback must be clear and consolidated in one message.
rules.rule3Description: Changes to the original brief after work has started are treated as new requests and billed separately.
rules.rule4Description: We deliver what you describe. The more detailed your brief, the better the result. No mind-reading required.
rules.policyText1: We value your time and our own. To maintain competitive prices and fast delivery, we operate on a fixed process.
rules.policyText2End: . Revisions must address small adjustments (color tweaks, text changes, minor repositioning) â€” not fundamental redesigns.
rules.policyText3: Changes to the brief after work has started, or additional revision rounds beyond the included 2, are billed at
rules.policyText4: By placing an order, you agree to these terms. Questions? Email us before ordering.
